rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0001
rows.name:
That was so fascinating,
what Seiryu told us...

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0002
rows.name: So, what is it we're doing again?

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0004
rows.name: You know full well, don't you?

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0005
rows.name:
We're going to head back to the capital
and rest at an inn before the big
knighting ceremony, of course.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0008
rows.name:
Becoming a knight of Iira won't
change a thing. You'll still be Laura

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0009
rows.name:
That's right. There's no reason to
make a big deal out of it in your mind.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0010
rows.name:
I hear what you're saying, but...
Even from a Prince and an Emperor,
it's hard to internalize it.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, as I mentioned earlier, why
not think of it like this.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0012
rows.name:
Becoming a knight gives you the
right to wield the Paragon of Iira.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0013
rows.name:
Indeed. You won't have to keep looking
over your shoulder for Torna coming
after you.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0015
rows.name: That makes me feel a little better.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0016
rows.name:
OK then! Let's head to the inn
and get ready for the ceremony.
